Sticky is the ultimate browser extension that lets you take your sticky notes everywhere with you. Sticky Notes on your browser can be a great way to remember things. This app offers the simplest and very physical like sticky notes experience on your browser. Stick as many notes on as many tabs as you like. With an infinite canvas, a delightful experience and support for every device, Sticky is ready to be your perfect companion.

Sticky notes doesn't have to be boring :) Try it today!

Key Features:
🎨 Infinite Canvas: Unleash your creativity with an endless canvas, allowing you to create as many notes as you need, without any limitations.

😊 Intuitive and Delightful: Enjoy a user-friendly interface that mimics the physicality of real sticky notes, making it easy and fun to jot down your thoughts and ideas.

🌐 Seamless Website Integration: Stick your notes directly onto any website, keeping important information at your fingertips and enhancing your browsing experience.

🎨 Customizable Colors: Personalize your notes with a vibrant array of colors, making it easy to categorize, prioritize, and visually organize your thoughts.

🔍 Powerful Search and Organization: Quickly find your notes by searching based on color, website, or attachments, saving you time and streamlining your workflow.

🔒 Secure and Private: Rest assured that your notes are kept private and secure, with advanced encryption and data protection measures.

🔥 Coming Soon:
👥 Real-Time Collaboration: Collaborate with your team in real-time, making it effortless to share ideas, delegate tasks, and stay in sync.

📱 Cross-Platform Support: Access your sticky notes on any device, whether you're using a desktop, laptop, tablet, or smartphone, ensuring you never lose track of your ideas.

📎 Rich Media Attachments: Enhance your notes by adding images, files, and other attachments, providing extra clarity and detail to your ideas.

🔗 Seamless Integrations: Integrate Sticky Notes with your favorite productivity tools and platforms, creating a unified and efficient workflow.

Whether you're a student, professional, or creative enthusiast, Sticky Notes empowers you to capture inspiration whenever it strikes. Say goodbye to scattered thoughts and hello to effortless organization and collaboration.

Try Sticky Notes today and experience the future of note-taking on your browser!
